title: 俄羅斯政府 暗示將干預「香港示威」

replies.msg:
俄羅斯政府的外交部 表示嚴正看待美國介入「香港示威」。 俄羅斯政府的外交部 更表示將作為中共的顧問，協助中共防範外國勢力干預「香港示威」。

https://translate.google.com/translate?hl=zh-TW&sl=ru&tl=en&u=https%3A%2F%2Fria.ru%2F20190809%2F1557350493.html

Zakharova commented on the statements of Beijing on US intervention in the affairs of China
15:32, August 9, 2019

MOSCOW, Aug 9 - RIA News. Russia has heard about statements by the Chinese authorities about the intervention of US special services in the internal affairs of China, we are talking about specific participation in organizing the riots in Hong Kong, the Russian Federation takes this seriously, said Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova.

"We really heard the statements of the Chinese leadership, which directly accused a number of Western intelligence agencies, in particular, the representative of the US intelligence agencies in meddling in internal affairs - and not just global intervention on a theoretical basis, but concrete participation in those riots and in organizing those riots, which we observe in Hong Kong, China, we took this information very seriously, "said Zakharova.

"As for the information sphere, we are planning consultations with my Chinese colleagues, and we will also touch on this topic," she said.

The diplomat also emphasized that the purpose of such an intervention is a destructive influence. “Everyone sees very well the pace and directions in which our countries are developing — this is both economic development and the development of peaceful defense potential. Our two countries are responsible participants in international relations and build them on the basis of international law. I think that’s just not like it.” - said Zakharova.

“We see a number of countries, and, unfortunately, the United States in this sense are among the first, do not want to give themselves labor to respect other members of international relations. They want to pursue their interests, exclusively setting their own goals, their own tasks, and just do not care about other participants in international relations. The example that Moscow and Beijing show them is very annoying, "she said.

Since June, protests against amendments to the law on extradition have not stopped in Hong Kong since they were initially peaceful, but each time the clashes on the streets of the city become more violent, tens of people have already suffered.

Zakharova commented on the statements of Beijing on US intervention in the affairs of China
15:32, August 9, 2019

MOSCOW, Aug 9 - RIA News. Russia has heard about statements by the Chinese authorities about the intervention of US special services in the internal affairs of China, we are talking about specific participation in organizing the riots in Hong Kong, the Russian Federation takes this seriously, said Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova.

"We really heard the statements of the Chinese leadership, which directly accused a number of Western intelligence agencies, in particular, the representative of the US intelligence agencies in meddling in internal affairs - and not just global intervention on a theoretical basis, but concrete participation in those riots and in organizing those riots, which we observe in Hong Kong, China, we took this information very seriously, "said Zakharova.

"As for the information sphere, we are planning consultations with my Chinese colleagues, and we will also touch on this topic," she said.

The diplomat also emphasized that the purpose of such an intervention is a destructive influence. “Everyone sees very well the pace and directions in which our countries are developing — this is both economic development and the development of peaceful defense potential. Our two countries are responsible participants in international relations and build them on the basis of international law. I think that’s just not like it.” - said Zakharova.

“We see a number of countries, and, unfortunately, the United States in this sense are among the first, do not want to give themselves labor to respect other members of international relations. They want to pursue their interests, exclusively setting their own goals, their own tasks, and just do not care about other participants in international relations. The example that Moscow and Beijing show them is very annoying, "she said.

Since June, protests against amendments to the law on extradition have not stopped in Hong Kong since they were initially peaceful, but each time the clashes on the streets of the city become more violent, tens of people have already suffered.

Zakharova commented on the statements of Beijing on US intervention in the affairs of China
15:32, August 9, 2019

MOSCOW, Aug 9 - RIA News. Russia has heard about statements by the Chinese authorities about the intervention of US special services in the internal affairs of China, we are talking about specific participation in organizing the riots in Hong Kong, the Russian Federation takes this seriously, said Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova.

"We really heard the statements of the Chinese leadership, which directly accused a number of Western intelligence agencies, in particular, the representative of the US intelligence agencies in meddling in internal affairs - and not just global intervention on a theoretical basis, but concrete participation in those riots and in organizing those riots, which we observe in Hong Kong, China, we took this information very seriously, "said Zakharova.

"As for the information sphere, we are planning consultations with my Chinese colleagues, and we will also touch on this topic," she said.

The diplomat also emphasized that the purpose of such an intervention is a destructive influence. “Everyone sees very well the pace and directions in which our countries are developing — this is both economic development and the development of peaceful defense potential. Our two countries are responsible participants in international relations and build them on the basis of international law. I think that’s just not like it.” - said Zakharova.

“We see a number of countries, and, unfortunately, the United States in this sense are among the first, do not want to give themselves labor to respect other members of international relations. They want to pursue their interests, exclusively setting their own goals, their own tasks, and just do not care about other participants in international relations. The example that Moscow and Beijing show them is very annoying, "she said.

Since June, protests against amendments to the law on extradition have not stopped in Hong Kong since they were initially peaceful, but each time the clashes on the streets of the city become more violent, tens of people have already suffered.

Zakharova commented on the statements of Beijing on US intervention in the affairs of China
15:32, August 9, 2019

MOSCOW, Aug 9 - RIA News. Russia has heard about statements by the Chinese authorities about the intervention of US special services in the internal affairs of China, we are talking about specific participation in organizing the riots in Hong Kong, the Russian Federation takes this seriously, said Russian Foreign Ministry spokeswoman Maria Zakharova.

"We really heard the statements of the Chinese leadership, which directly accused a number of Western intelligence agencies, in particular, the representative of the US intelligence agencies in meddling in internal affairs - and not just global intervention on a theoretical basis, but concrete participation in those riots and in organizing those riots, which we observe in Hong Kong, China, we took this information very seriously, "said Zakharova.

"As for the information sphere, we are planning consultations with my Chinese colleagues, and we will also touch on this topic," she said.

The diplomat also emphasized that the purpose of such an intervention is a destructive influence. “Everyone sees very well the pace and directions in which our countries are developing — this is both economic development and the development of peaceful defense potential. Our two countries are responsible participants in international relations and build them on the basis of international law. I think that’s just not like it.” - said Zakharova.

“We see a number of countries, and, unfortunately, the United States in this sense are among the first, do not want to give themselves labor to respect other members of international relations. They want to pursue their interests, exclusively setting their own goals, their own tasks, and just do not care about other participants in international relations. The example that Moscow and Beijing show them is very annoying, "she said.

Since June, protests against amendments to the law on extradition have not stopped in Hong Kong since they were initially peaceful, but each time the clashes on the streets of the city become more violent, tens of people have already suffered.

但俄佬對烏克蘭同格魯吉亞就簽過曬既文件都可以唔算數，俄佬仲搞番烏克蘭同格魯吉亞轉頭
俄羅斯喺波羅的海仲有塊飛地呀，唔守唔得啦

replies.msg:
芬蘭應該入埋北約

俄國果件撚樣日里諾夫斯基日日話愛沙尼亞應該芬蘭化
